attributes.action: PETITION NOT TO MAKE SUGGESTED POLICE BUDGET CUTS
attributes.additional_details: I WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO RECONSIDER ITS DECISION TO MAKE 20% CUTS TO THE POLICE--I FEEL THAT THE CURRENT PROPOSED CUTS ARE INADVISABLE --THERESA MAY TOLD A POLICE SUPERINTENDANTS CONFERENCE IN 2010--"THE BRITISH PUBLIC DONT SIMPLY RESORT TO VIOLENT UNREST IN THE FACE OF CHALLENGING ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES" SEEMS SHE WAS WRONG AND SHOULD ADMIT THAT!!
